name: iPhone 12
description: The iPhone 12 features a stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, 5G capability, and a powerful A14 Bionic chip. It also has a dual-camera system with Night mode, Deep Fusion, and 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording.

name: Galaxy S21
description: The Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5G capability, and a powerful Exynos 2100 processor. It also has a triple-camera system with 8K video recording, as well as an improved Night mode and Single Take feature.

name: OnePlus 9
description: The OnePlus 9 features a 6.55-inch Fluid AMOLED display, 5G capability, and a powerful Snapdragon 888 processor. It also has a triple-camera system co-developed with Hasselblad, as well as Warp Charge 65T fast charging technology.

name: Pixel 6
description: The Pixel 6 features a 6.4-inch AMOLED display, 5G capability, and a powerful Tensor processor. It also has a dual-camera system with improved Night Sight and Astrophotography capabilities, as well as a new Material You design.
